text.config.fst.title: Fire's Survival Tweaks Config
text.config.fst.option.enableBlazePowder: Blaze Powder works like Bone Meal when used on Nether Wart.
text.config.fst.option.enableInfestedBlo: Silverfish Infested Blocks will break at the same speed as the original block.
text.config.fst.option.enableCaveins.des: More destruction at once = higher chance.
text.config.fst.option.enableFallingBloc: Blocks that should fall will when the player is near.
text.config.fst.option.enableSlimeToMagm: Slimes absorb Magma to turn into Magma Cubes.
text.config.fst.option.enableMagmaCubeGr: Magma Cubes absorb Magma to grow.
text.config.fst.option.enableSlimeGrowth: Slimes absorb Slime and Honey Blocks to grow.
text.config.fst.option.enableMagmaCubeTo: Magma Cubes cool to Slime when wet.
